{{Infobox football club | clubname = PetroJet | image = [[File:PetroJet Lovers.png|230px|logo]]| fullname = PetroJet Football Club | nickname = Barcelona Egyptian, Blaugrana | founded = 1980 | ground = [[Mubarak International Stadium]]
[[Suez]], [[Egypt]] | capacity = 45,000 | chairman = {{flagicon|Egypt}} '''Mohamed Abdul Hafez''' | manager = {{flagicon|Egypt}} [[Taha Basry]] | league = [[Egyptian Premier League]] | season = [[2010â11 Egyptian Premier League|2010-11]] | position = 10th | pattern_la1=|pattern_b1=_red_stripes|pattern_ra1=| leftarm1=094ca1|body1=094ca1|rightarm1=094ca1|shorts1=094ca1|socks1=094ca1| pattern_la2=|pattern_b2=_vneckblack|pattern_ra2=_blackborder|pattern_la2=_blackborder| leftarm2=000000|body2=FFFFFF|rightarm2=000000|shorts2=000000|socks2=000000| }} '''PetroJet Football Club''' is a [[Association football|football]] team of the Egyptian Petrol Company, PetroJet. They are based in [[Suez]]. The team is about to commence their fifth season in the [[Egyptian Premier League]]. PetroJet football team was promoted to the [[Egyptian Premier League]] for the first time since its founded five years ago for season 2006/2007. PetroJet team reserved their ticket to the [[Egyptian Premier League]] after a fierce competition with a number of strong teams like [[Tersana]], [[Al-Sekka Al-Hadid]] and others. The team play since they joined the city of Suez to the [[Egyptian Premier League]] in the season 2006/2007. PetroJet's Coaching Staff is currently led by [[Helmi Toulan]], Former Coach of top Egyptian Club [[Zamalek SC]]. ==History== '''PetroJet''' is a [[Association football|football]] team of the Egyptian petrol company, PetroJet. They are based in [[Suez]]. Founded in 1980. The team is about to commence their fiveth season in the [[Egyptian Premier League]]. ===PetroJet's History in The Egyptian Premier League=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" !
